text: @NYGovCuomo Look there is another part of NY. You only talk about NYCity. Let me tell you Up State NY should also be acknowledged in this damn Covid-19 BS. I have family in Up State NY and would like to know if it is up there.If you need to know exactly what part I am referring Rochester,NY.
